## Wye Pipes

### Input Data

```{r}
variable <- c(1,2,6,8,9,15)
```

### Forward Wye Pipe

```{r}
mean(variable); sd(variable)
variable %Y>% c(mean,sd)
```

### Backward Wye Pipe

```{r}
mean(variable); sd(variable)
c(mean,sd) %<Y% variable
```
